title: In the End
lyrics:
Fools rush in
I'm not making that mistake again
Will you be my friend?
'Cause I don't need a lover right now
Hold me and I'll bend
Tell me secrets no one else knows about



'Cause, baby, in the end

Lovers seem to come and go

If I don't hold too tight

Maybe we'll never have to let go



Let go, go, let go... let go... let go...



Fools rush in

I'm not making that mistake again

But if you love me, then let me go

Trust I'll find my way back somehow



'Cause, baby, in the end

Lovers seem to come and go

If I don't hold too tight

Maybe we'll never have to let go



Let go, go, let go... let go... let go...
